entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:50 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
